It‚Äôs not too late ‚Äì we must extend this crucial program.

I‚Äôm proud to have voted for the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw & look forward to seeing how it impacts our regional economy, creates local jobs, & improves our infrastructure.

Federal dollars could:
¬†
- Reduce pollution in our hardest-hit neighborhoods
- Decrease supply chain bottlenecks
- Increase our use of #cleanenergy
¬†
These projects would allow hardworking #CA51 residents to earn good money to keep the lights on & put food on the table.

I‚Äôve represented communities in the South Bay throughout my career. I‚Äôm excited to see how the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw will create good-paying, local jobs right here in #CA51 & fund crucial projects at the @portofsandiego.

This morning, I joined @RepScottPeters, @portofsandiego Chairman Malcolm and President & CEO Joe Stuyvesant, and @CityOfNatlCity Mayor Sotelo-Solis in #CA51 to discuss how the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw will create jobs in our region & modernize our infrastructure. https://t.co/vvC9vWrkus

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will strengthen economic opportunities for everyone.
¬†
I‚Äôm especially proud that my bill to expand the purchase & production of critical #COVID19 medical supplies through the Defense Production Act is included in this transformative legislation.

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act would invest $45 million to bolster every corner of our economy.

It ensures that the U.S. can compete globally by fixing supply chains & boosting American manufacturing. Proud to work with my @HouseDemocrats colleagues on this transformative legislation.
